activity.fulldescription: Shows guild members' activity status in a general view

addrole.description: Adds to the given member the given role.
addrole.massrole-error: I couldn't add that role to **{member}**. Skipping..
addrole.error: I couldn't add **{role}** role to **{member}** because that error: `{error}`.

ban.description: Bans a member from this server with(out) any reason.
ban.error: I couldn't ban **{member}** because of this error: `{error}`.

embed.title: ¡You got banned from {guild}!
embed.default_reason: *There wasn't a specific reason, but you had to do something really bad*

call.fulldescription: Uses my user search tool to mention them in a message, assuming each ID/name/tag is separated by spaces

clean.description: Cleans up the requested amount of messages
clean.error: I couldn't clean up these messages due this error `{error}`
clean.50016: Error 50016: Provided too few or too many messages to delete. Must provide at least 2 and fewer than 100 messages to delete

code.description: Copies a message from the given [message ID](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206346498-Where-can-I-find-my-User-Server-Message-ID-) and pastes it in code format

copy.description: Copies a message using thir URL or ID
copy.ext_guild: For privacy, i can't leak messages from other servers.

createchannel.description: Creates a channel with at least a type and a name
createchannel.fulldescription:
Creates a new channel with a type (`text` or `voice` or `news` or `store` or `category`), a name without spaces, and optionally properties in `property:value` format and permissions overwrite in `role/user:{permissions}` format. The properties are:
`position`: The position of the channel counted from top to bottom.
`nsfw`: If present, the channel will be nsfw.

The permissions values are their [official permission name](https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/permissions#permissions-bitwise-permission-flags).
createchannel.30013: Error 30013: Maximum number of guild channels reached (500)

createrole.description: Creates a role with at least a property.
createrole.fulldescription:
Creates a role with a name or at least a property in `property:value` format, if you create a role with only the name, it'll have basic permissions({default}), neither color, nor will be hosited nor mentionable. The properties are:
`name` - Name of new role
`color` - Color as [hex number](https://htmlcolors.com/color-picker) or as [constant](https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/stable/typedef/ColorResolvable)
`permissions` - The sum of [the permissions](https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/permissions#permissions-bitwise-permission-flags) you wanna include on the role [as hex number](https://calcuonline.com/calculadoras/calculadora-hexadecimal/#suma-hexadecimal) (eg: A role with all permissions [7fffffff] but administrator [8] should be 7ffffff7)
`hoist` - when included, the role will be visible in members list
`mentionable` - When included, the role is mentionable by any member. Useful for helper roles.
createrole.high_position:
the role you're gonna create is at my position or higher than all my roles, so...
Command cancelled.
createrole.30005: Error 30005: Maximum number of guild roles reached (250)

createwebhook.description: Creates a webhook for this channel
createwebhook.30007: Error 30007: Maximum number of webhooks reached (10)

deletechannel.fulldescription: Deletes a channel. The secret key is got using `getpass` command, command only allowed for administrators.

demote.description: Demotes a member with(out) a(ny) reason.
demote.asbuddy: you can't demote a buddy or superior, you're evil.
demote.success: **{author}** has demoted to **{member}**, they aren't **{role}** anymore. Now they're **{member.highest}.**
demote.error: I couldn't demote because of this error: `{error}`

editchannel.property_question: ¿Which property do you want to modify on that channel? Properties are `name`, `topic`, `position`, `permissions`
editchannel.name_question: What will be the new channel name?
editchannel.topic_question: What will be the new channel topic?
editchannel.position_question: Which position do you want to move that channel at? Answer typing a `number`
editchannel.permissions_question: What do you want to do? Answer typing `allow roles` if you want to allow permissions to one or more roles, `deny roles` if you want to deny them permissions, `allow users` if you want to allow permissions to one or more members or `deny users` if you want to deny them permissions
editchannel.allow_role_question: Which roles do you want to allow channel permissions to? You can type the role name, paste role IDs, or mention them. Split up each role with a line break.
editchannel.deny_role_question: Which roles do you want to deny channel permissions to? You can type the role name, paste role IDs, or mention them. Split up each role with a line break.
editchannel.allow_user_question: Which members do you want to allow channel permissions to? You can type the username (include the #xxxx part to avoid conflicts), paste user IDs, or mention them. Split up each member with a line break.
editchannel.deny_user_question: Which members do you want to deny channel permissions to? You can type the username (include the #xxxx part to avoid conflicts), paste user IDs, or mention them. Split up each member with a line break.
editchannel.short_name: {name} is too short, if it were longer maybe...
editchannel.more_options_question: Do you want to modify another channel property? Answer `yes` or `no`
editchannel.permissions_list_question: Which permissions do you want to modify to these {length} {type} ? You can type a number either decimal or hexadecimal OR a [permissions names] list(https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/permissions#permissions-bitwise-permission-flags) splitted by line breaks.
editchannel.long_name: The name you typed is too ling, please, 100 characters at most
editchannel.long_topic: The topic you typed is too ling, please,1024 characters at most.

editrole.fulldescription:
Edits a single property or various properties of chosen role in `property:value` format. Properties are:
`name` - New role name
`color` - New color as [hex number](https://htmlcolors.com/color-picker) or as [constant](https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/stable/typedef/ColorResolvable)
`permissions` - The sum of [the permissions](https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/permissions#permissions-bitwise-permission-flags) you wanna change as [hex number](https://calcuonline.com/calculadoras/calculadora-hexadecimal/#suma-hexadecimal) (eg: A role with all permissions [7fffffff] but administrator [8] should be 7ffffff7)
**Togglables:**
A togglable property hasn't a value associated, instead you use a `-` prefix to remove it or `+` prefix to add it.
`hoist` - Wheter the role is visible in member list (+) or not (-)
`mentionable` - Wheter the role is mentionable by any member (+), useful for helper roles, or not (-).
`any_permission` - If you wanna add (+) or remove (-) a single permission, just need to use either of the signs as prefix and type the [official permission name](https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/permissions#permissions-bitwise-permission-flags). Eg: +manage_roles
editrole.not_found: i couldn't find {mention} role, try again using ID or quoting the role name
editrole.invalid_format: the input has an invalid syntax. The right syntax is { property:value, property:value, *...* }
editrole.warn_highposition:
Warning: I can't change the position if is higher or equal than my highest role.
Position value skipped.
editrole.error_highposition: i couldn't change the position if is higher or equal than my highest role
editrole.position_NaN: Position value: `{position}` isn't even a number.

name_change.error: i couldn't rename the role to {value}.

color_change.success: **{role.name}**'s color is **{r.hexColor}** now, an original name for a color
color_change.error: i couldn't set {value} color to the role. Are you sure {value} is a color?

position_change.error: i couldn't change the role position to {value} .

permissions_change.error: i couldn't set {value} bitfield permission to role. Maybe you are asking for more permissions i can give.
permissions_change.NaN: hex number permission isn't valid, it must be the hexadecimal sum of all permissions to set on role. If you just wanna add/remove a single permission you can use `+permission` o `-permission` in the command args. Eg: +ban_members

mentionable_change.remove_success: **{role}** now **isn't mencionable**(unless you have Mention All Roles permission)
mentionable_change.remove_error: i couldn't set the role as **not mencionable**.

editsnipe.error: There was an error sending editsnipe.

focusban.description: Will ban a member from this server with(out) any reason.
focusban.fulldescription: Will ban when the given time finishes (x**d**x**h**x**m**x**s**)to the given member from the guild by any or no reason.This can fail if, for example, the member leaves.
focusban.success: After **{time}** seconds, **{member}** will be banned by {reason}

focuskick.description: Will kcik a member from this server with(out) any reason.
focuskick.fulldescription: Will kick when the given time finishes (x**d**x**h**x**m**x**s**)to the given member from the guild by any or no reason.This can fail if, for example, the member leaves.
focuskick.success: After **{time}** seconds, **{member}** will be kicked by {reason}

help.fulldescription: Show all commands list if there's not arguments, or detailed command help from the given command

general.title: All Observador's commands
general.footer: Use {prefix}help <command> to see how to use a command

about.title: {commandName} details
about.footer: <> = required | [] = optional. |  <> o <> = 2 possible ways to use the command | []... = many arguments as possible | Don't include these symbols when you're typing the command.

default.no_usage: *Just type the command name and that's all*

lang.fulldescription: Shows or changes the language i type (`en` (english) & `es` (spanish) available)

mute.description: Mutes a member (or everyone) from a voice channel for (un)limited time

rae.description: Defines a spanish word according to RAE

removerole.description: Removes from a given member the given role.
removerole.error: I couldn't remove the role because of this error: `{e}`

renameeveryone.description: Removes everyone nicknames or adds prefix to their names

resetallroles.fulldescription: Resets all permissions of each role in the server (if i can), if you don't wanna set permissions to 0, you can include [the sum](https://calcuonline.com/calculadoras/calculadora-hexadecimal/#suma-hexadecimal) of [permissions](https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/permissions#permissions-bitwise-permission-flags) you wanna set all roles. Requires a secret key you can get using `getPass` command.

resetmember.description: Removes all roles from a member.
resetmember.fulldescription: Removes all roles from a member of this server (if i can modify them). Requires a secret key you can get using `getPass` command.

roleinfo.fulldescription: Sends information about the given role.

snipe.fulldescription: Shows the last deleted message in this channel
snipe.error: There was an error sending the deletesnipe.

stop.description: I turn off. *Command use exclusive to my creator*.
stop.error: Just my creator can use this command.

unban.description: Unbans the user from the given ID.
unban.fulldescription: Unbans the user from the given ID with(out) any reason, you can also unban everyone(`{prefix}unban everyone`) but requires your secret key got by using `{prefix}getpass` command
unban.start: Starting massive unban, you invite them, ok?
unban.massunban-error: There was an error unbanning {user.tag}. Skipping...
unban.10013: Error 10013: The user asocied to the given ID couldn't have found.
unban.10026: Error 10026: The user was not banned in the first place.

userinfo.fulldescription: Shows information about the given member or yourself if you don't include arguments.

embed.name: Name
embed.footer: * If you wanna see those values as array add --details to this command

webhooks.description: Lists all webhooks of this channel or another one. Requires passcode.

whisper.description: Sends a DM at chosen user

permissions.VIEW_CHANNEL: Read Text Channels & See Voice Channels

errors.clean_up_failed: I'm sorry... i don't think I can clean up this mess either. You should use MEE6 or a bot of those.
errors.dm_closed: i couldn't send you a private message, maybe you closed it or deactivated the private messages from this server.
errors.enough_timers: I have to focus on many punishment. I can't support it, I'm a bot but it doesn't mean I deserve these treatments.
errors.invalid_duration: please, send a valid duration time on format `n`d`n`h`n`m`n`s being `nd` n days, `nh` n hours, `nm` n minutes and `ns` n seconds. I require at least one time unit to valid the duration
errors.invalid_user: i couldn't do anyhing beacuse the user {mention} isn't valid
errors.invalid_message: the given ID (`{id}`) couldn't be resolved as a message from this channel, was it deleted?
errors.invalid_member: i couldn't do anything because the member {mention} either isn't valid or isn't in the server anymore
errors.invalid_password: at least one pair of characters from the secret key doesn't represent a number, maybe your secret key was not sent by me.
errors.invalid_role: i couldn't do anything because the role {mention} is invalid
errors.long_prefix: my prefix cannot be longer than 4 characters.
errors.lower_bot: i can do nothing to a member who is at my position or higher
errors.lower_roles: 'i can't manage a role if that's higher or equal than my highest role
errors.NaN: whatever you typed is not a valid number. Or are you gonna tell me {value} is a number?
errors.no_dms: I can't use this kind of commands in DMs!
errors.not_enough_args:
i couldn't do anything due to lack of arguments. The right usage for that command is 
{prefix}{commandName} `{usage}`
